footer.policy: NextFi is the trade name of Next Financial Investments, a company registered with United Arab Emirates. All services are provided outside other countries and are licensed and/or registered with OAE.

landing.heroTitle: Explore new opportunities in financial investing
landing.heroTitleUnder: Modern AI solutions provide reliable tokenomics, sustained growth in investments, and ensure the safety of your funds.
landing.nextfiNewEra: – a new era in the world of financial investments based
landing.modernArtifi: Modern artificial intelligence technologies have been trained by hundreds of the best programmers based on data from the largest investment assets and funds. As a result, the Next technologies individually generate a percentage of investments for partners and create liquidity for the NextFi token.
landing.computat: Computational operations for market analysis with continuous improvement of AI
landing.makeRepeat: Make repeated investments in the NextFi investment system
landing.dailyGrow: Daily growth of your capital with the ability to track in real time and secure profits at any moment.
landing.upTo12: Up to 12% bonuses on savings balance
landing.earningSmart: Earning smart interest on the amount of your investments in your personal account.
landing.HowIsIncome: How is income from investments formed?
landing.stckDesc: Tracking successful promotions and ensuring financial security in trading on the market.
landing.artDesc: Our AI-powered trading robot automatically executes transactions in the financial market, utilizing advanced algorithms to generate profits.
landing.metalDesc: Constantly increasing assets and executing profitable transactions with them
landing.bondsDesc: Ownership of multiple corporate bonds with regular updates and profitable financial transactions.
landing.oilDesc: Smart and efficient trading of oil products in the eastern market
landing.innvtDesc: Analysis and search for the most promising projects aimed at acquiring a stake and subsequent growth of dividends
landing.prtfDesc: Our Personalised Investment Portfolio System allows you to invest in stocks, bonds, startups, and commodities, providing tailored opportunities for capital growth based on your experience, goals, and preferences.
landing.getDesc: Our goal is to create the simplest and most comfortable conditions for investing in the NextFi project.
landing.accDesc: Simple and quick registration on our platform. In just a few minutes, you'll gain access to all the features of NextFi
landing.tokenDesc: You can purchase the NextFi token using most popular cryptocurrencies. The fixed price and bonus system allow each early user of our platform to gain maximum advantages.
landing.boxDesc: The convenient investment box system of NextFi offers flexible investment conditions. You can always withdraw your funds early or choose a level that matches your requirements.
landing.openSite: Instantly open new positions on the NextFi website and app
landing.qr: Point your phone to get quick access to the platform
landing.youAlways: You always have access to investments at your fingertips
landing.whatisDesc: NextFi is an innovative financial investment platform powered by cutting-edge artificial intelligence. Trained on vast datasets from the world's leading investment funds and asset managers, our AI-driven technology dynamically analyzes market trends, optimizes investment strategies, and generates sustainable liquidity for the NextFi token. With NextFi, investors gain access to a smarter, data-driven approach to wealth growth, ensuring maximum efficiency and risk management in an ever-evolving financial landscape.
landing.minimum: What is the minimum investment required to start with NextFi?
landing.minDesc: The minimum investment required to start with NextFi is $20. This amount ensures optimal allocation of AI-driven investment strategies, providing users with the best possible returns while maintaining system efficiency.
landing.doesDesc: Our AI-powered algorithms analyze market trends, manage risks, and execute strategic investments across DeFi, liquidity mining, algorithmic trading, and other financial instruments to maximize returns.
landing.safAi: How does NextFi ensure the safety of my funds?
landing.aiDesc: NextFi employs advanced AI-driven risk management, a dedicated liquidity reserve, and diversified asset allocation to safeguard investments from volatility and market fluctuations.
landing.diff: What makes NextFi different from other investment platforms?
landing.diffDesc: Unlike traditional investment platforms, NextFi integrates AI and automation to continuously optimize portfolio performance, adapt to market changes in real time, and provide users with a highly efficient, transparent, and secure investment experience.
landing.howDowinvest: How do my investments stay safe at Next
landing.howDowinvest2: At NextFi, you always make a profit, regardless of market fluctuations. If an AI investment turns out to be unprofitable, we will compensate for the losses at the expense of the reserve fund, and your capital remains protected.
landing.whereMoney: Where does the money in the reserve fund come from
landing.whereMoney2: The Reserve Fund is replenished manually and its balance is updated daily. You can always check its current status.
landing.howOften: How often does AI make mistakes?
landing.howOften2: AI is constantly being improved, reducing the likelihood of errors. With each new investment cycle, the system becomes smarter and the risks decrease. But AI errors do not affect your investments in any way, as they are protected by a reserve.
landing.findDesc: Send your details and we will contact you shortly
landing.name: Name
landing.byClick: By clicking the button, you agree to the terms of

profile.uCan: You can choose from available avatars or upload a new one.

profile.suppFormat: Supports JPG,PNG and GIF. Maximum upload file size 10 MB
profile.makeSure: Make sure your nickname does not contain disrespectful language, official names(i.e. product names), or names of other trading platforms
profile.urNick: Your nickname is used for trading and in-app messages
profile.canBe: Your nickname can be edited 3 more time(s) this year
profile.reminder1: Once your country/region is changed, some of your tag/memo addresses and asset holdings may become unsupported. Check if your deposit address is still valid, and consider trading your assets before proceeding as withdrawals may incur high fees.
profile.youcan: You can only update your country/region of residence once every 90 days. Updating it also means you'll need to complete your identity verification again.

security.closeDesc: Once you close your account, it is permanent and can't be restored
security.protectAcc: To protect your account, you won't be able to withdraw fundsor use P2P trading to sell crypto for 24 hours after you reset or change your account phone.

security.after2: Your account Username@gmail.com will be frozen temporarily. To unfreeze it, start by logging in again

security.why2: I don't want to use this account anymore.
security.why3: I want to use another cryptocurrency platform.
security.protectFrz: To protect your account, you will not be able to withdraw funds within 24 hours after resetting your settings or changing your account password.

deposit.errChoose: Please choose a network and crypto
deposit.depositWarr: Make a deposit at the specified address. Be sure to check the network address, otherwise the funds will be irretrievably lost.
deposit.iConfirm: I confirm that the transfer of funds has been completed
deposit.waitConf: Waiting for confirmation from the network
deposit.interpt: You can interrupt the waiting and go to the overview, the funds will be credited to the balance automatically
deposit.fundsBalance: The funds will be credited to your balance soon
deposit.howmake2: NextFi is an innovative financial investment platform powered by cutting-edge artificial intelligence. Trained on vast datasets from the world’s leading investment funds and asset managers, our AI-driven technology dynamically analyzes market trends, optimizes investment strategies, and generates sustainable liquidity for the NextFi token.
deposit.whyStill: Why have I still not recelved my deposit?
deposit.whyStill2: Verification of the payment and confirmation of the network takes from 10 to 30 minutes.
deposit.howSelect: How do I select the correct network for my crypto deposit and deposits?
deposit.howSelect2: hen choosing a network for a deposit, be sure to check the networks and payment methods before transferring, otherwise it will be impossible to refund the funds.
deposit.doI: Do I need to pay fees for deposit and deposit?
deposit.doI2: There is no commission when making a deposit on the platform, but this does not apply to the commission for the transfer itself from your wallet.

swap.howConvert: How do I convert crypto NextFi Platform?
swap.howConvert2: To perform the conversion operation, you must select the initial token and the one you want to convert to, regardless of the different networks.
swap.whichCrypto: Which crypto can I convert on NextFi Platform?
swap.whichCrypto2: Any coin available on the platform is eligible for conversion.
swap.howCrypto: How is crypto conversion different from trading?
swap.howCrypto2: Crypto conversion is the process of exchanging one cryptocurrency for another, whereas trading involves actively buying and selling cryptocurrencies in order to profit from fluctuations in their prices.
swap.whereCrypto: Where can I find my converted crypto?`
swap.whereCrypto2: The converted currency will be displayed in the assets and overview personal account on the NextFi platform.`
swap.depositCrypto: How can I deposit/withdraw the crypto converted?
swap.depositCrypto2: Converted cryptocurrencies, like regular cryptocurrencies, can be withdrawn by selecting one of several available networks for the selected token

tier.usersWith: Users who withdraw investments ahead of time receive a partial experience proportional to the percentage they have already earned. For example, if a user has earned 50% of the possible income, then they will receive 50% of the total experience (5 points instead of 10).
tier.expertWith: -2% fee for early withdrawal, -20% investment term for specific asset types
tier.noFee: No fee for early withdrawal, -30% investment term for any assets

activity.joinUs: Join us on the entire journey of developingJoin us on the entire journey of developing
activity.lvlBonus: Level and Bonus System in NextFi
activity.eachInvs: In NextFi, each investment brings you experience points (XP). When you reach a new level, you get the opportunity to choose one bonus from the list. There are 6 levels and 6 unique bonuses available.
activity.addPerc: Additional percentage of profit on investments.
activity.reducFee: Reducing the fee for early withdrawal
activity.reducMin: Reducing the minimum investment period for certain assets
activity.theHigh: The higher your level, the more opportunities you get! Grow in NextFi, choose a strategy and accumulate benefits for maximum earnings
activity.genAct: General activity and launch of the NextFi token
activity.urInvs: Your investment activity not only brings you profit, but also helps to develop the entire NextFi ecosystem! Each investment fills the overall progress bar, reflecting the contribution of all users to the development of the platform. When the bar reaches 100%, we will officially launch the NextFi token, and all participants who contributed will receive an exclusive airdrop!
activity.invUr: Invest - your investments increase the overall progress
activity.dvlpEco: Develop the ecosystem - the more investments, the closer the token launch
activity.getRew: Get a reward - after the token release, all active participants will receive an airdrop depending on their contribution
activity.follwPrgs: Follow the progress bar and become a part of the future of NextFi!
activity.invstXp: Invest - each successful investment gives you XP
activity.levelUp: Level up - having accumulated the required amount of experience, you move to a new level
activity.chooseBonus: Choose a bonus - all available bonuses are displayed in advance, but you can open them one at a time for each new level

invest.iCmfrWith: I confirm the withdrawal of funds to the address
invest.verifCode: A verification code will be sent to asdadasd@mail.ru
invest.howConvert: How can I invest on the platform NextFi?
invest.howConvert2: To invest on the NextFi platform, you need to select the investment sector you are interested in, the period and indicate the amount you want to invest.
invest.whichCrypto: Where can I keep track of my investments?
invest.whichCrypto2: You can track all investment transactions on the cards in the investments tab. Each user receives detailed information regarding the details of investing, and also has full management of their assets in
invest.howCrypto: How many investment periods are there?
invest.howCrypto2: The maximum duration of a single investment in nextfi is 80 days.
invest.whereCrypto: What percentage can I get when investing on the platform?`
invest.whereCrypto2: The maximum return on invested funds that you can receive is 14 percent.`
invest.depositCrypto: Can I withdraw my investment early?
invest.depositCrypto2: You can withdraw funds invested in the investment industry at any time convenient for you, taking into account the commission for early withdrawal.

withdrawal.confirmWith: I confirm the withdrawal of funds to the address
withdrawal.verifCode: A verification code will be sent to asdadasd@mail.ru
withdrawal.howmake2: To withdraw funds, you must select a withdrawal token, select an available network, and then specify the withdrawal address and amount.
withdrawal.whyStill: Why is withdrawal taking so long?
withdrawal.whyStill2: The withdrawal time depends on the network load, the average waiting time is 30-60 minutes
withdrawal.howSelect: How do I select the correct network for my crypto withdrawals?
withdrawal.howSelect2: The network is selected from those presented for each token and must match the network of the specified withdrawal address.
withdrawal.doI: Do I need to pay fees for withdrawal?
withdrawal.doI2: TThe NextFi platform does not charge a withdrawal fee.
